description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. FAST FAST LASER LASER is the first great 4-player, top-down, competitive multiplayer game since Bomberman. In combat, you have two weapons: a laser-blasting pistol and a plasma sword. Players can shoot lasers and tactically reflect them off of mirrors––or other lasers––to take out opponents. With the sword you can attempt to deflect incoming laser blasts with a well-timed swing.
description.short: FAST FAST LASER LASER is the first great 4-player, top-down, competitive multiplayer game since Bomberman. In combat, you have two weapons: a laser-blasting pistol and a plasma sword. Players can shoot lasers and tactically reflect them off of mirrors––or other lasers––to take out opponents. With the sword you can attempt to deflect incoming laser blasts with a well-timed swing.
